threats.title: Spoofing/Impersonation
threats.description: Malicious Actors could spoof Users through phishing or other social engineering methods

threats.title: Data Tampering
threats.description: Malicious actors could gain access to the database and attempt to create or alter existing events to create disorder (Affects Event Collection API)
threats.mitigation: 2FA or MFA for access to the database, alongside verification of data entered into the database by a dedicated team before being pushed to the app. Have a audit trail if events that go through can be traced.

data.name: Directs Information/Cookies to rest of App

labels: Directs Information/Cookies to rest of App

data.name: Sends Listed VIP Features as Options

labels: Sends Listed VIP Features as Options

threats.title: Spoofing/Impersonation
threats.description: Malicious Actors could spoof Event Organizers through phishing or other social engineering methods.
threats.mitigation: 2FA and MFA access alongside strict governance set for individuals in these roles for the app

threats.title: VIP Cookie Access
threats.description: Unauthorized individuals who are not VIPS could change or alter scripts entered into Login Procedures to give themselves VIP access which allow certain features
threats.mitigation: Apply stricter session management and apply secure, http only cookies to protect access and prevent session tokens from lingering.

threats.title: Fake Accounts with High Level Access Created
threats.description: Accounts created into the Database with the wrong level of access could allow organizations with VIPS and access to unauthorized places.
threats.mitigation: Restrict access to the database and require authentication of connections to Database to alter data

threats.title: Unauthorized Access
threats.description: Unauthorized Access to the database allows malicious actors to steal personal information in regards to attendees of the event.
threats.mitigation: Encryption of User Data, Proper Access Control, and have a dedicated team to moderate the database throughout the event.

threats.title: New STRIDE threat
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: Unauthorized Access
threats.description: Unauthorized Access to the Advertisements API could allow a malicious actor to upload their own advertisements (such as ransomware or scripts) that could harm customers. Or, even moreso, a group could delete advertising from the application which would harm the business
threats.mitigation: Moderation, and limited access of the API to restrict certain behavior leading up to the event.

threats.title: Fraudulant Payment
threats.description: Malicious Actors could try and abuse the payment process to make fraudulent purchases, such as excess tickets/VIP access, etc.
threats.mitigation: Have compliance for payment methods utilizing card information and apply strict rules on the frame of payment options available.
